name: Online Marketing Made Easy with Amy
what_you_do: The Amy Porterfield Show is a podcast that focuses on creating sustainable scale in online businesses through effective marketing strategies and candid conversations with experts.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves entrepreneurs and business owners looking to improve their marketing, increase revenue, and achieve lifestyle freedom.
bio: Amy has grown her online business to $120 million in revenue and has received numerous positive reviews for her podcast.
business_focus: The Amy Porterfield Show is a podcast that focuses on creating sustainable scale in online businesses through effective marketing strategies and candid conversations with experts. (online marketing)
